ComicInfo.Summary:
This 23 page preview book from Wizard Magazine introduces our heroine and gives a little insight into who she is. She sits in her fully formed Endless Graveyard the queen of all that is dead and dying she muses on lucifer, her curse, her father, her mother.
She finds a church built in her land and enters to find Niccolo playing wit the Nexus of All Things. A gateway that can connect to anywhere. He is mad with the power of it and uses the power to take her sword, restrain her to the wall and demand Lucifer's power from her. She breaks free and Niccolo shows her that he Mother is the anchor for the Nexus a good person to balance out with th evil of this place.
Incensed Lady Death makes his heart explode in his chest. She releases her mother and tells her to goto heaven gate and that she cannot follow.
Following the main comic there is a:
4 page interview about the creation of Lady Death .4 pages of designing Lady Death and the comic itself with sketches.
